messages.content: LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI is a plugin for ComfyUI that allows exporting tasks for LAizypainter, a Photoshop plugin for sending tasks to a Stable Diffusion server.

To install LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI, clone the repository into the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' folder using the command 'git clone https://github.com/DimaChaichan/LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI' and restart ComfyUI.
How can you access LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI in ComfyUI?
To access LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI in ComfyUI, right-click outside a node and select 'LAizyPainter Export...'.
What are the three tabs in the LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI dialog?
The three tabs in the LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI dialog are Config, Variable, and Prompt, which represent the keys to be set in the LZY file.
What can you set in the Config tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI?
In the Config tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI, you can set the configuration for the task.
What can you set in the Variable tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI?
In the Variable tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI, you can set the variables for the task.
What can you do in the Prompt tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI?
In the Prompt tab of LAizypainter-Exporter-ComfyUI, you can connect the variables with the prompt.
